觰字的基本解释

觰
zhā
兽角的下端大。
〔觰拏（
两角上端张开。n?）〕古书上说的一种兽名。

觰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhā］
［《廣韻》陟加切，平麻，知。］
(1)角向上张开。
(2)引申为张开。
(3)太，过多。

觰字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觰； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1143第43
【唐韻】【集韻】?陟加切，音奓。【說文】觰拏，獸也。　又【六書故】角本大也。俗謂梎據爲觰拏，披張爲觰沙。　又【說文】角上張也。【玉篇】角上長也。【廣韻】角上廣也。　又【集韻】展賈切，奓上聲。?觰，牛角上張貌。　又陟嫁切，奓去聲。義同。　又【廣韻】都賈切，音近打。牛角橫也。　【玉篇】或作奓。【集韻】亦作?、?。

觰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
觰字的起名意思

暂无。

觰
Basic explanation of words
觰
zhā
The lower end of the horn is large.
〔觰拿(
The upper ends of the two corners are open. n?)] A kind of animal name said in ancient books.
觰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhā］
["Guangyun" Zhi Jiaqi, Ping Ma, Zhi. ]
(1) The corners open upwards.
(2) Extended to open.
(3) Too, too much.
觰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Jiao Zi Department] 　觰; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1143 Page 43
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Zhi add cut, sound. [Said the text] Take it, the beast.　[The Story of the Six Books] Jiao Ben is also big. It is commonly said that the shackles are sacred, and the piercings are sacred sand.　[Said Wen] Zhang Ye is on the corner. [Jade articles] Long on the corners. [Guang Yun] Jiao Shang Guang Ye.　[Ji Yun] Show Jia Qi, 奓上声. Go, look on the horns.　 Then Zhi married and cut, dying. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Du Jiaqie, the sound is close. The horns are also horizontal.　【Jade articles】Or make a baby. [Ji Yun] also used as ?, ?.
